recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with creamy sauce.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Mix all together and serve warm.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: A healthy breakfast with mashed avocado and eggs.
instructions: Mash the avocado and spread it.
Place the egg on top and season.
